deﬁnition of ﬁrst hidden layer. We almost always have multiple samples, therefore, the model
will expect the input component of training data to have the dimensions or shape: [samples,
timesteps, features]. Our split sequence() function in the previous section outputs theX
with the shape [samples, timesteps], so we easily reshape it to have an additional dimension
for the one feature.
# reshape from [samples, timesteps] into [samples, timesteps, features]
